column4: my wireless connection is much weaker than when i run windows on the same computer. the signal is so weak under ubuntu that i can't really use the internet or install updates, as they all time out. can anyone help?
i'm using a d-link wireless adapter tylie
under previous releases of ubuntu, i got good signal strength but not anymore
try some config tweaks, maybe you need some firmwares downloading to your system
it'll give you an output and you acn see whats going on
